text: Patrick Lam (born 24 June 1983) is a Hong Kong equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Hong Kong Category:Equestrians at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Equestrians at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Equestrians at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Hong Kong Category:Medalists at the 2010 Asian Games
title: Patrick Lam
